ing: 2 fluid ounces white creme de cacao
des: "This blended cocktail combines the Italian herbal liqueur Galliano, with crÃ¨me de cacao and cream for a frothy and refreshing libation."
ins: Combine Galliano, creme de cacao, cream, and ice in a blender. Puree on low speed for 10 seconds. Strain into chilled Champagne flute.
